channel.title: CVE Feed for LoRa -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LoRa -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-11068|2024-08-04T11:21:14.647Z -- lora -- loramac-node
item.description: In LoRaMac-node before 4.4.4, a reception buffer overflow can happen due to the received buffer size not being checked. This has been fixed in 4.4.4.
